verses.verse: <S%G3588><s%> For The Rest, <S%G3063><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brethren, <S%G3450><s%> Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord : <S%G2962><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same Things <S%G846><s%> To Write <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G1698><s%> To Me <S%G3303><s%> Is Not <S%G3756><s%> Irksome, <S%G3636><s%> <S%G5213><s%> And For You <S%G1161><s%> Safe. <S%G804><s%>
See To <S%G991><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Dogs, <S%G2965><s%> See To <S%G991><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> Workers, <S%G2040><s%> See To <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Concision. <S%G2699><s%>

<S%G2249><s%> For We <S%G1063><s%> Are <S%G2070><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Circumcision, <S%G4061><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> In Spirit <S%G4151><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Serve, <S%G3000><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Boast <S%G2744><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Trust. <S%G3982><s%>

Though <S%G2539><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Have 2192 V-PAP-NSM Trust 4006 N-ASF Even 2532 CONJ In 1722 PREP Flesh; 4561 N-DSF If 1487 COND Any 5100 X-NSM Thinks 1380 V-PAI-3S Other 243 A-NSM To Trust 3982 V-2RAN In 1722 PREP Flesh, 4561 N-DSF I 1473 P-1NS Rather : 3123 ADV

As To Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> <S%G4061><s%> On The Eighth Day; <S%G3637><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Race <S%G1085><s%> Of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> Of The Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Benjamin, <S%G958><s%> Hebrew <S%G1445><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Hebrews; <S%G1445><s%> According To The <S%G2596><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> A Pharisee; <S%G5330><s%>

According To <S%G2596><s%> Zeal, <S%G2205><s%> Persecuting <S%G1377><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly; <S%G1577><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> Having Become <S%G1096><s%> Blameless; <S%G273><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> What Things <S%G3748><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Gain, <S%G2771><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> I Have Esteemed, <S%G2233><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Loss. <S%G2209><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Yea Rather, <S%G3304><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I Am Esteeming <S%G2233><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Loss <S%G2209><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Excellency <S%G5242><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> Of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> My Lord, <S%G3450><s%> ' On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> I Suffered Loss Of, <S%G2210><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Esteem Them <S%G2233><s%> Refuse <S%G4657><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> I May Gain; <S%G2770><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Be Found <S%G2147><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G1699><s%> My Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> But <S%G235><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Of Christ Is, <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> To Know <S%G1097><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fellowship <S%G2842><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3804><s%> Of His Sufferings, <S%G846><s%> Being Conformed <S%G4833><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2288><s%> To His Death, <S%G846><s%>
<S%G1487><s%> If By Any Means <S%G4459><s%> I May Arrive <S%G2658><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G1815><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Dead. <S%G3498><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> I Received, <S%G2983><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Have Been Perfected; <S%G5048><s%> <S%G1377><s%> But I Am Pursuing, <S%G1161><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I May Lay Hold, <S%G2638><s%> ' <S%G1909><s%> For That <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I Was Laid Hold Of <S%G2638><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Brethren, <S%G80><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Myself 1683 F-1ASM Not 3756 PRT-N Do Reckon 3049 V-PNI-1S To Have Laid Hold; 2638 V-RAN 1520 A-NSN But One Thing 1161 CONJ 3588 T-APN The Things 3303 PRT Behind 3694 ADV Forgetting, 1950 V-PNP-NSM 3588 T-DPN And To The Things 1161 CONJ Before 1715 ADV Stretching Out, 1901 V-PNP-NSM

Towards The <S%G2596><s%> Goal <S%G4649><s%> I Pursue <S%G1377><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prize <S%G1017><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> On High <S%G507><s%> Calling <S%G2821><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

As Many As <S%G3745><s%> Therefore Are <S%G3767><s%> Perfect <S%G5046><s%> <S%G5124><s%> Should Be Of This Mind; <S%G5426><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> If In <S%G1487><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> Differently <S%G2088><s%> Ye Are Minded, <S%G5426><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Will Reveal. <S%G601><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> <S%G1519><s%> Whereto <S%G3739><s%> We Attained, <S%G5348><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> To Walk <S%G4748><s%>, Rule, <S%G2583><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Be Of The Same Mind. <S%G5426><s%>

Imitators Together <S%G4831><s%> Of Me <S%G3450><s%> Be, <S%G1096><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Consider <S%G4648><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Walking <S%G4043><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Ye Have For <S%G2192><s%> A Pattern <S%G5179><s%> Us; <S%G2248><s%>

Many <S%G4183><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Are Walking <S%G4043><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Often <S%G4178><s%> I Told <S%G3004><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3568><s%> And Now <S%G1161><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Weeping <S%G2799><s%> I Tell You, They Are <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Enemies <S%G2190><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Cross <S%G4716><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Christ : <S%G5547><s%>

Whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> End Is <S%G5056><s%> Destruction, <S%G684><s%> Whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God Is <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Belly, <S%G2836><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G152><s%> Their Shame, <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Earthly Things <S%G1919><s%> Mind : <S%G5426><s%>

<S%G2257><s%> For Of Us <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Commonwealth <S%G4175><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> Exists, <S%G5225><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3757><s%> Also As <S%G2532><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> We Are Waiting The <S%G553><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>
